name: CapitalWeatherGang
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The inside scoop on weather in the D.C. area from The Washington Post. Get your weekday morning weather update from the Capital Weather Gang in under a minute. Capital Weather Gang updates can also be heard on WAMU.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
